関連科目:
None but strong English language skills and an interest in International Relations are recommended.
***Important***This whole course is designed to prepare students for the Japanese English Model United Nations from July 19 to July 21 off-campus (At Kindai University in Osaka). There will be a small cost involved to attend JEMUN (15000 yen). Although technically optional and no marks are awarded for actually attending JEMUN, the focus of the course is to go to the conference. JEMUN has already allotted 12 spots for students in this class so please do not take the spot of another student if you do not plan to attend the conference. Conversely, if you would like to attend JEMUN but cannot take this class we likely can arrange for you to participate without taking this class. If you would like to be included in the KGU JEMUN group please contact the instructor as early in the semester as possible.
授業の概要・背景: The United Nations, its connected organizations, and other international organizations have a large influence on International Relations. This course will show the history and structure of these organizations and how they relate to one another. Students will also participate in a simulation of the United Nations to better understand the functions and procedures it uses.
